description: Various global and regional initiatives exist around the world, focused on different aspects of research, information-sharing, conservation and management related to coral reefs. These initiatives can support countries in their efforts to achieve the Aichi Biodiversity Targets and the Sustainable Development Goals. This page provides links to some of these initiatives.
unepGCRP: UN Environment Global Coral Reef Partnership
icri: International Coral Reef Initiative; and Global Coral Reef Monitoring Network
cti: Coral Triangle Initiative on Coral Reefs, Fisheries and Food Security
